deleteAccount.title: Delete your account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your entire account and all data you have uploaded.
deleteAccount.descriptionAdmin: Permanently delete your entire account, organization, and all data you have uploaded. As an owner, this will delete the entire organization and all members.
deleteAccount.dialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
deleteAccount.dialogDescriptionAdmin: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers. As an owner, this will also delete the entire organization and all members.
deleteAccount.confirmPermanent: I understand this action is permanent and cannot be undone
deleteAccount.confirmData: I understand all my data will be permanently deleted
deleteAccount.confirmTenantAccess: I understand all users in this {{scope}} will no longer have access

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage users and invitations to your organization.

invite.title: Invite Users
invite.description: Add email addresses to invite new users to your workspace.
invite.defaultRole: All new users will be assigned the User role by default.
invite.adminNote: To grant admin access, update their role later in Settings > Users.
invite.emailsPlaceholder: Enter email addresses separated by commas
invite.maxEmails: Separate multiple email addresses with commas (max 50)

editSheet.title: Edit user
editSheet.lastOwnerWarning: Cannot change role: This is the only active owner in the organization. Promote another member to owner first.

roles.ownerDescription: Full control over all content, members, and settings
roles.adminDescription: Can manage users and content, but not other admins/owners
roles.userDescription: Can view and chat with content but not manage users

deactivate.title: Deactivate User
deactivate.description: Are you sure you want to deactivate {{email}}? They will be blocked from accessing the system immediately.

delete.title: Permanently Delete User
delete.description: Are you sure you want to PERMANENTLY delete {{email}}? This will delete their account from Keycloak, remove all their data (messages, conversations, files), and cannot be undone.
delete.ownerWarning: WARNING: If they are the only member, this will delete the entire organization and all data.

roleChange.title: Change User Role
roleChange.description: This will change {{email}}'s role from {{oldRole}} to {{newRole}}. This may affect their permissions.

bulkDelete.title: Permanently Delete Users
bulkDelete.description: Are you sure you want to PERMANENTLY delete {{count}} user(s)? This will delete their accounts from Keycloak, remove all their data (messages, conversations, files), and cannot be undone. If any are the only owner, their entire organization will be deleted.

toast.resendSuccessDesc: A new invitation has been sent to {{email}}
toast.cancelSuccessDesc: The invitation to {{email}} has been cancelled

cancel.title: Cancel Invitation
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to cancel the invitation for {{email}}? They will no longer be able to accept this invitation.

bulkCancel.title: Cancel Invitations
bulkCancel.description: Are you sure you want to cancel {{count}} invitation(s)? This action cannot be undone.

error.title: Failed to load invitations
error.description: An error occurred while fetching invitations. Please try again.

knowledgeSources.title: Knowledge Sources
knowledgeSources.description: Connect knowledge bases to help RITA answer questions with accurate information.

connectionSources.title: Connection Sources
connectionSources.description: Connect your knowledge and ticketing sources to help RITA resolve IT issues faster.

itsmSources.title: ITSM Sources
itsmSources.description: Connect ticketing systems to enable autopilot clustering and automated responses.
itsmSources.trainingDescription: Rita is analyzing your tickets to create ticket groups. This usually takes a few minutes.

errors.loadDataSourcesDescription: An error occurred while fetching connection sources. Please try again.
